unnormalised: Ed-Tech Boom: Scholarship Portals Making Dreams Accessible for Every Student!
normalised: Ed-Tech Boom: Scholarship Portals Making Dreams Accessible for Every Student!

unnormalised: Forget slogging through endless websites! Scholarship portals are seriously leveling the playing field for Indian students. Imagine finding the perfect scholarship while enjoying some delicious biryani – that's the ease we're talking about!
normalised: Forget slogging through endless websites! Scholarship portals are seriously leveling the playing field for Indian students. Imagine finding the perfect scholarship while enjoying some delicious biryani – that's the ease we're talking about!

unnormalised: From IIT Bombay aspirants to students in remote villages of Rajasthan, these platforms are connecting students with opportunities they might otherwise miss. Websites like Vidya Dhan and Buddy4Study are becoming household names, helping students navigate the often-complex world of financial aid.
normalised: From I I T Bombay aspirants to students in remote villages of Rajasthan, these platforms are connecting students with opportunities they might otherwise miss. Websites like Vidya Dhan and Buddy four Study are becoming household names, helping students navigate the often-complex world of financial aid.

unnormalised: Heard that Pooja from Patna got a scholarship worth Rs. 50,000 through one such portal? Amazing, right? Many portals are even offering scholarships tailored to specific communities and fields, like engineering and medicine. It's like a digital Onam gift that keeps on giving – opening doors to education for countless deserving students across India, regardless of their background or location (even if they're 500 km away from the nearest city!). Talk about a game changer!
normalised: Heard that Pooja from Patna got a scholarship worth rupee fifty thousand through one such portal? Amazing, right? Many portals are even offering scholarships tailored to specific communities and fields, like engineering and medicine. It's like a digital Onam gift that keeps on giving – opening doors to education for countless deserving students across India, regardless of their background or location (even if they're five hundred kilometer away from the nearest city!). Talk about a game changer!
